comment.author: 42288525@N03
comment._content:
Seated in the middle of the front row wearing his blue sash of office, is C.R. Swart.

Charles Robberts Swart (1894-1982), last Governor-General of the Union of South Africa, 1960-1961, and first State President of the Republic of South Africa, 1961-1967.

comment.author: 60827889@N08
comment._content:
I confirm Bamburi's identification of Swart
Immediate right  of Swart - Eric Louw, South African diplomat and Foreign Minister
